p: The leaves of R. chalepensis were collected during its flowering time, in April 2015, from three regions of Palestine; Jerusalem (the middle part of the West Bank), Hebron (the southern part of the West Bank), and Jenin (the northern part of the West Bank). The plant taxonomical classification was carried out by Pharmacognosist Dr. Nidal Jaradat. Voucher specimens were deposited in the Pharmacognosy Laboratory, Faculty of Medicine and Health Sciences, An-Najah National University, under the code number: Pharm-PCT-2084.
